name: Braaisoft
body:
Braaisoft builds scalable business intelligence software for the retail sector. We are based in Cape Town, South Africa.

## About

Braai is the traditional South African social gathering around an open fire. It represents the shared joy, laughter and merriment of cooked food over warm coals.

## Hiring

We are actively hiring young, driven Clojure and Java developers part-time and full-time to further develop business intelligence products for retail enterprises. The pay is good and the team is led by [Petrus Theron](http://petrustheron.com/). If you are smart and interested in a cutting edge stack (Clojure, Datomic, React), please email petrus AT our name DOT COM.

## Partnerships

If you are a company specialising in logistics, forecasting, human resources or other enteprise resource planning functions, we may be interested in partnering with you.
